description.@en: A gentle touch dispatches the grievously wounded to the hereafter.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch (providing they are suffering from a Grievous Injury) must Resist with a successful Coordination Test or be instantly Slain!.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but the foe cannot Resist this Magick.

criticalFailure.@en: The twin pennies begin burning in your hand with a purple light. An Ã†theric whiplash of energy springs forth from your hand, as you are automatically set On Fire.

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
